hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
export WORKSPACE=`pwd`
#Install dependencies source /home/test/.bashrc sudo yum install -y git wget gcc make which
#Install Go wget https://storage.googleapis.com/golang/go1.9.2.linux-s390x.tar.gz chmod ugo+r go1.9.2.linux-s390x.tar.gz sudo tar -C /usr/local -xzf go1.9.2.linux-s390x.tar.gz export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/go/bin go version
sudo ln /usr/bin/gcc /usr/bin/s390x-linux-gnu-gcc
export GOPATH=$WORKSPACE mkdir $GOPATH/bin export PATH=$GOPATH/bin:$PATH wget https://glide.sh/get sh get
# clone and build the heketi git clone https://github.com/heketi/heketi.git $GOPATH/src/github.com/heketi/heketi cd $GOPATH/src/github.com/heketi/heketi git checkout v6.0.0 make make test
# verify cd $GOPATH/src/github.com/heketi/heketi sudo mkdir -p /var/lib/heketi/ sudo ./heketi --config=etc/heketi.json & sleep 15s wget http://127.0.0.1:8080/hello
export Expected_str="Hello from Heketi" export Actual_str=$(cat hello)
if [[ $Expected_str == *"$Actual_str"* ]]; then echo "Same" else exit 1 fi
